item.title: Archegos 交易员的强硬证词让 Hwang 脸上的笑容荡然无存
item.description: 在审判的大部分时间里，Archegos Capital Management 创始人 Bill Hwang 看起来并不像一个可能面临数十年牢狱之灾的人。无论在法庭内外，人们经常看到 Hwang 脸上挂着平和的微笑。【原文：For most of his trial, Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang hasn’t looked like a man potentially facing decades in prison. Both inside and outside the courtroom, Hwang is often seen with a placid smile on his face.】

item.title: 莱恩表示，欧洲央行看到市场重新定价，但不会出现混乱局面
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲中央银行认为没有理由过度担忧法国近期的金融动荡。【原文：The European Central Bank sees no reason to be overly concerned about recent financial turbulence in France, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 德国储蓄银行回购股票计划被视为对债券持有人的不利因素
item.description: 北极证券（Arctic Securities）的分析师在给客户的一份说明中说，瑞典房东 SBB 用现金回购多达 5000 万股 D 类股票的计划对债券持有人来说是 "负面信用"，因为该公司的流动性状况将进一步削弱。【原文：Swedish landlord SBB’s plans to buy back as many as 50 million Class D shares with cash is “credit negative” for bondholders since the company’s liquidity position will weaken further, analysts at Arctic Securities said in a note to clients.】

item.title: 交易员评估勒庞的再次保证，法国债券走势暂缓
item.description: 极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞保证，如果她在即将举行的全国大选中获胜，她将与埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统合作，这为法国政府债券赢得了一些喘息机会。【原文：French government bonds won some respite after assurances from far-right leader Marine Le Pen that she would co-operate with President Emmanuel Macron should she prevail in upcoming national elections.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数平静表面下的大交易
item.description:
了解分散交易。【原文：

Understanding the dispersion trade.

】

item.title: 德意志银行将从北欧联合银行购买 17 亿欧元航空贷款
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）同意从北欧联合银行（NordLB）购买约 17 亿欧元（18 亿美元）的航空贷款。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG agreed to buy about €1.7 billion ($1.8 billion) in aviation loans from NordLB, which is exiting the sector to focus on areas such as renewable energy financing.】

item.title: 瑞典央行调查显示零售商认为最糟糕的时期已经过去
item.description: 瑞典中央银行对企业进行的一项调查显示，瑞典商业部门的经济形势仍然弱于正常水平，但各行各业显然都希望经济形势能在六个月内得到改善。【原文：Sweden’s economic situation remains weaker than normal in the business sector, but there are clear hopes across all industries that the situation will have improved within six months, according to a survey of businesses by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 家庭工作的拥护者 Stellantis 要求工程师返回办公室
item.description: Stellantis NV 公司已将其汽车工程师送回办公室，扭转了首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）用来削减开支的政策。【原文：Stellantis NV has sent its auto engineers back to the office, reversing a policy that Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares has used to cut expenses at a company that championed home working in the wake of the pandemic.】

item.title: 瑞典卡诺夫公司在财团撤回竞标后跌幅创历史之最
item.description: 瑞典法律服务提供商 Karnov Group AB 在斯德哥尔摩暴跌 22%，原因是两家美国投资公司在股东的抵制下撤回了对该公司的收购。【原文：Swedish legal services provider Karnov Group AB tumbled 22% in Stockholm after two US investment firms withdrew their bid for the company amid shareholder resistance to the deal.】

item.title: 中国对进口欧盟猪肉发起反倾销调查
item.description: 随着北京和布鲁塞尔之间的贸易紧张局势加剧，中国对从欧盟进口的猪肉发起了反倾销调查。【原文：China has launched an anti-dumping probe on pork imports from the European Union, as trade tensions between Beijing and Brussels ratchet higher.】

item.title: 法拉利首席执行官维格纳在发动机和电池选项之间徘徊— 因为买家希望两者兼得
item.description: 超级跑车制造商法拉利公司首席执行官表示，法拉利公司在未来几年内不会放弃内燃机，公司将继续致力于为广大买家提供全系列的动力系统。【原文：Ferrari NV won’t be giving up on internal combustion anytime in the coming years, the supercar maker’s chief executive officer said, as the company remains committed to a full range of powertrains for a wide range of buyers.】

item.title: 乌克兰推迟债券持有人会谈，未就债务重组达成协议
item.description: 乌克兰为偿还 200 多亿美元国际债务而举行的第一轮正式会谈在没有达成协议的情况下结束了，投资者和政府在如何处理今年夏天将重新开始的债券支付问题上仍远未达成一致。【原文：Ukraine’s first round of formal talks to rework over $20 billion of its international debt has ended without a deal, with investors and the government still far from agreement on what should happen with bond payments due to restart this summer.】

item.title: 瑞士政府对今年的经济增长和通货膨胀更加乐观
item.description: 瑞士政府第二次下调了 2024 年的通胀预期，此举有助于解释为什么瑞士央行可能在本周晚些时候召开的官员会议上再次降息。【原文：Switzerland’s government lowered its forecast for 2024 inflation for a second time, a move that helps explain why the central bank might cut interest rates again when officials meet later this week.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯在收到匿名信后对中国展开调查
item.description: 阿迪达斯股份公司在收到一封匿名信，揭露一些员工可能违反合规规定后，正在对中国的腐败指控进行调查。【原文：Adidas AG is investigating allegations of corruption in China after receiving an anonymous letter exposing potential compliance violations by some employees.】

item.title: 巴黎失去欧洲最大股票市场的桂冠，被伦敦超越
item.description: 法国的政治动荡导致该国失去了欧洲最大股票市场的宝座，而这距离从英国手中夺走这一桂冠还不到两年时间。【原文：France’s political upheaval has led the country to lose its spot as Europe’s biggest equity market, less than two years after stealing that crown from the UK.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播： 连续下跌后，股市本周将强势开盘
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 数据令人失望，中国房地产下滑加剧：图表
item.description: 中国房地产市场已经触底了吗？根据 5 月份的数据，还没有，国家统计局也表示，宽松措施需要更多时间才能见效。【原文：Has China’s property market hit bottom? Not quite yet, according to May data, and to the National Bureau of Statistics, which said easing measures will need more time to take effect.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 中国加强对无情购债狂潮的警告
item.description: 有迹象表明，购买国债的热潮正在回落，中国通过国家媒体报道加强了对债券多头的警告。【原文：China has ramped up warnings against bond bulls via state-media reports amid signs the frenzy to buy government debt is trickling back.】

item.title: 武伊契奇：欧洲央行必须改善通胀才能在 9 月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）认为，9 月份降息需要欧洲中央银行的通胀前景有所改善。【原文：An interest-rate cut in September would require an improvement in the European Central Bank’s inflation outlook, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 势头依然强劲
item.description:
问题在于，当大摩抛弃投资者时，将是大时代。【原文：

The problem is that when Big Mo deserts investors, it will be Big Time.

】

item.title: 债券守夜人的幽灵笼罩英国大选活动
item.description:
工党和保守党都在宣扬审慎的财政政策，2022年的市场崩溃给政客们带来的创伤让他们保持了清醒

。【原文：

Both Labour and the Conservatives are preaching fiscal prudence ahead, with the trauma of 2022’s market rout keeping politicians in line

】

item.title: 欧洲交易员在法国投票的意外呼声中寻找掩护
item.description: 忘掉夏季的欧洲选择吧。【原文：Forget about a summer swoon in European options.】

item.title: 达能押注人口老龄化将推动医疗营养需求增长
item.description: 正在扭亏为盈的法国酸奶生产商达能公司正在加大对癌症患者和老年人营养饮品的投资，押注人口老龄化将促进长期增长。【原文：Danone, the French yogurt maker in the midst of a turnaround, is stepping up investment in nutritional drinks for cancer patients and the elderly, betting an aging population will boost long-term growth.】

item.title: 英国通胀率可能降至 2% 的目标，但拯救苏娜克为时已晚
item.description: 英国通胀率预计将在近三年来首次降至英格兰银行的目标值，但这一里程碑可能对首相苏纳克在 7 月 4 日大选前陷入困境的政府帮助不大。【原文：UK inflation is expected to fall to the Bank of England’s target for the first time in almost three years, but the milestone may do little to help Prime Minister Rishi Sunak’s beleaguered government ahead of the July 4 general election.】

item.title: 十四年的保守党统治让英国的 "近邻主义 "大行其道
item.description: 在过去的 14 年里，执政的保守党选择不干预绝大多数的英国住宅建设申请，从而让当地的反开发怀疑论者的影响力不断扩大。【原文：The ruling Conservative Party let local anti-development skeptics to grow in influence over the past 14 years by choosing not to intervene in the vast majority of UK homebuilding applications.】

item.title: 中国向企业发放数十年前的税单，暗示资金困难
item.description: 中国地方政府已要求多家公司缴纳上世纪 90 年代的税款，这凸显了在经济复苏不平衡和房地产持续低迷的情况下，地方政府对资金的需求。【原文：Local governments in China have asked several companies to pay tax bills dating back as far as the 1990s, underscoring their need for funding given the uneven economic recovery and persistent housing slump.】

item.title: 中国水力发电量激增 铝产量创历史新高
item.description: 由于冶炼厂恢复了闲置产能，中国上个月的铝产量创下了历史新高，这有可能使铝价在 5 月份创下两年新高后进一步下跌。【原文：China’s aluminum production hit a record last month as smelters brought back idled capacity, potentially setting up the market for further declines after prices hit a two-year high in May.】

item.title: 中国经济数据喜忧参半 工业金属跌势加剧
item.description: 铁矿石下跌超过 2%，铜也延续了近期的跌势，因为中国的经济数据凸显了持续的疲软态势，尤其是在金属密集型的房地产行业。【原文：Iron ore fell more than 2% and copper extended its recent decline after economic data from China highlighted continued weak spots — especially in its metals-intensive property sector.】

item.title: MUFG 部门在丑闻中错失大量债券安排机会
item.description: 三菱日联摩根士丹利证券公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities Co.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities Co. was absent from at least seven yen bond deals Monday of the kind that it would usually join, as the fallout spreads from allegations of financial wrongdoing.】
